card.name: Butthurt (bsun)
card.text:
You may only attack or target the face of this card.
{t} or {ut}: Add hurt counter to Butthurt.
You and face of this card take a shot for each hurt counter on Butthurt: Exile Butthurt.

card.name: Cocksgiving
card.text: Choose any number of players. Each player that takes a shot creates a 1/1 Potato creature token.

card.name: Cocks of Winter
card.text:
Kicker Any player may take a shot.
All player stake a shot. Each player that takes a shot creates a 1/1 Winter Potato token. They have Snow landwalk and "All lands are Snow-Covered in addition to their other types."
If Cock of Winter was kicked each player that took a shot creates an additional Winter Potato token for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Winter Potato
card.text:
Snow landwalk
All lands are Snow-Covered in addition to their other types.
